item.title: Data guidelines for clean and usable data
item.author: Caterina
item.description: The 80/20 split Since project deadlines tend to be more or less fixed, the extent to which a dataset follows a set of commonly expected guidelines will often determine how much time you have left to spend thinking about your analysis. To use the split that everyone conventionally mentions, you would hope to spend a modest 20% of your time cleaning the data for a project, and 80% planning and carrying out your actual analysis.
